main event: An observer in Mexico reported seeing a mysterious aircraft while traveling from Mexico City to Tampico on 7 August 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as being 120 ft long and narrow, Its color was a silo yellow with no lights typical of aircraft, It had a rounded nose and appeared to be trailing a pinpoint of fire, The object was moving at an estimated speed of 350 miles per hour at about 5,000 feet altitude, The observer was able to follow the object until it passed behind trees.
sighted object: a mysterious aircraft described as torpedo-shaped with a trailing light
witness description: The observer was alone, traveling from Mexico City to Tampico.
